solution_line_template: Each bag was ${bag_price} but was marked down {discount_percent} for clearance so that's {bag_price}*{discount_percent} = $<<{bag_price}*{discount_percent}={discount_amount}>>{discount_amount} discount
Each bag was ${bag_price} and there is a ${discount_amount} discount so each bag is {bag_price}-{discount_amount} = $<<{bag_price}-{discount_amount}={discounted_bag_price}>>{discounted_bag_price}

Each bag was marked down to ${discounted_bag_price} a bag and she bought {num_bags} bags for a total of {discounted_bag_price}*{num_bags} = $<<{discounted_bag_price}*{num_bags}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
